menu.title: Welcome to Zenith EBank!
menu.subtitle: Experience a new era of digital banking Secure, reliable, and tailored for you.

contact.title: GET IN TOUCH
contact.description: Have questions or need help? Reach out to us through any of the following ways or fill out the form below.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To revolutionize the banking experience by providing secure, efficient, and innovative financial solutions that empower individuals and businesses.

entities.jhipster-needle-menu-add-entry: JHipster will add additional entities here (do not translate!)

services.title: Our Core Services
services.accountManagementDesc: Easily manage your bank accounts, view transaction history, and check balances anytime.
services.securePaymentsDesc: Perform quick and secure payments to vendors, bills, or friends with just a few clicks.
services.globalTransfersDesc: Send and receive money globally with competitive exchange rates and no hidden fees.
services.creditCardManagementDesc: Monitor your credit card usage, pay bills, and request new cards with ease.
services.investmentManagementDesc: Plan and manage your investments with expert tools and insights tailored for your financial growth.
services.financialAnalysisDesc: Analyze your financial data to make informed decisions about your investments.

securityPolicy.title: Bank Security Policy
securityPolicy.intro: In our electronic banking project, we are committed to the highest security standards to protect customer data and ensure the safety of financial operations. This policy is designed to outline the measures we take to maintain a secure and reliable banking environment.

dataEncryption.title: 1. Data Encryption
dataEncryption.content: We use the latest encryption technologies to secure data, including:
dataEncryption.bullet1: Encrypting all customer data during storage.
dataEncryption.bullet2: Protecting passwords with advanced encryption techniques.
dataEncryption.bullet3: Ensuring the safety of sensitive details related to payments and transactions.

twoFactorAuth.title: 2. Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
twoFactorAuth.content: We provide two-factor authentication for all customers to enhance login security.
twoFactorAuth.bullet1: A verification code is sent to the customer's mobile device or email to confirm identity.

fraudDetection.title: 3. Fraud Detection and Analysis
fraudDetection.content: Our advanced systems monitor financial activity continuously to detect suspicious activities.
fraudDetection.bullet1: Immediate alerts are issued in case of suspicious transactions.
fraudDetection.bullet2: Advanced analytics identify suspicious patterns proactively to prevent fraud.

jwt.title: 4. Account and Transaction Protection Using JWT
jwt.content: Banking operations are secured using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for session authentication.
jwt.bullet1: JWT prevents unauthorized access to customer data or banking services.
jwt.bullet2: Authentication tokens are renewed periodically to maintain top security levels.

digitalPayments.title: 5. Security in Digital Payments
digitalPayments.content: All digital transactions are conducted through secure payment interfaces designed to verify payment validity before processing.
digitalPayments.bullet1: Fraud protection in payments through user identity verification.

securityAudits.title: 6. Continuous Security Audits
securityAudits.content: We conduct regular audits on our system to ensure compliance with the latest security standards.
securityAudits.bullet1: Banking platforms are continually updated to counter new cyber threats.

customerDataProtection.title: 7. Protecting Customer Personal Data
customerDataProtection.content: Our systems are committed to protecting personal customer data such as addresses, phone numbers, and emails.
customerDataProtection.bullet1: User access and permissions are determined based on their roles for additional protection.

tips.title: 8. Tips to Protect Your Accounts
tips.bullet1: Use strong and unique passwords for each account.
tips.bullet2: Avoid sharing your login credentials with others.
tips.bullet3: Regularly review your transactions and report any suspicious activity.

support.title: 9. Support and Assistance
support.content: If you have any inquiries about your account security or suspect unauthorized activity, please contact us via:

authenticated.suffix:
, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters.

phoneNumber.maxlength: Phone number cannot be longer than 15 characters.
phoneNumber.pattern: Phone number must be numeric and between 10 and 15 characters.

validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{ max }} bytes.

validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
validation.patternLogin: This field can only contain letters, digits and e-mail addresses.
